meanings.definition: Confused or muddled in mind; foolish or silly.
meanings.sent1: The addlepated student couldn't remember where he left his backpack.
meanings.sent2: She felt addlepated after staying up all night studying for the test.
meanings.sent3: The addlepated puppy kept chasing its own tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: His addlepated behavior at the party raised a few eyebrows.
meanings.sent5: The addlepated old man wandered the streets aimlessly, lost in his thoughts.
